Cloths' Development Kit This provides internal functionalities to develop custom Style. See built-in styles to know how to use each functionalities.

Types

Cloth = object
  style*: Style = nil
  data*: Data = nil

Constant = ref object of Style
Similar to Multiline, but will NOT apply the style. 
Data = ref object
  case isString*: bool
  of true:
      str*: string

  of false:
      subitems*: seq[Cloth]

  
Empty = ref object of Style
Ignore = Empty
Iterator = object
  
MultiLine = Plain
Plain = ref object of Style
Style = ref object of RootObj

Lets

constant = Constant()
empty = Empty()
ignore = Ignore()
multiline = MultiLine()
plain = Plain()

Consts

rendered: Style = nil
